commands.desc: Teleports you to a bonus in the map.  Usage: !bonus (Abbreviation: !b)

Displays player's recently broken records.
  Usage: !broken [target] (Abbreviation: !rb)
Displays top times in a bonus.  Usage: !btop [mapname]  Example: !btop surf_lessons
Displays compare personal record menu.  Usage: !cpr [target/@maprank] [mapname]  Example: !cpr @10 surf_lessons
Displays player's country rank in chat.  Usage: !crank [target]
Teleports you back one stage.  Usage: !goback (Abbreviation: !gb)
Search for a player by name.  Usage: !lookup [name]  Example: !lookup Absolute
Search for a player by steamid.  Usage: !lookupsteamid [steamid]  Example: !lookupsteamid STEAM_0:0:4442884
Displays map information in chat.  Usage: !m [mapname]  Example: !m surf_lessons
Displays map information menu.  Usage: !mapinfo [mapname] (Abbreviation: !mi)  Example: !mi surf_lessons
Displays a list of maps and their tiers.
Displays player's map rank in chat.  Usage: !mrank [target/@rank] [mapname]  Example: !mrank @10 surf_lessons
Displays main map menu.  Usage: !mtop [mapname]  Example: !mtop surf_lessons
Displays next player's menu.  Usage: !next [target/@rank]  Example: !next @10
Displays player's playtime in chat.  Usage: !playtime [target/@rank]  Example: !playtime @10
Displays player's personal record on a map.  Usage: !pr [target/@maprank] [mapname]  Example: !pr @10 surf_lessons
Displays player's rank in chat.  Usage: !rank [target/@rank]  Example: !rank @10
Return to the beginning of the map.
Saves your location.  Usage: !saveloc [<origin x y z><angle p y r><velocity x y z>]
Search the command list for the given string of text.  Usage: !search [text]
Teleports you to a stage in the map and enables practice mode.  Usage: !stage (Abbreviation: !s)
Displays top player's by points.  Usage: !surftop (Abbreviation: !st)
Teleports you to the start of your current stage.
Displays time left until map end.
Displays player's by number of WRs.
Displays player's by number of WRBs.
Displays player's by number of WRCPs.
Displays top times in a map.  Usage: !top [mapname]  Example: !top surf_lessons
Displays player's by amount of Top10 points.
Displays the WR on a map.  Usage: !wr [mapname]  Example: !wr surf_lessons
Displays the WRB on a map.  Usage: !wrb [#bonusnumber] [mapname]  Example: !wrb #2 surf_lessons
